head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, HARVEY ALDEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, HARVEY ALDEN

block.p: EPSTEIN-Harvey Alden. Born in New York. Died in Newport Beach, CA, July 4, 1998. Age 46. Son of Lila and Joseph Epstein. Husband of Hanni. Brother of Sydelle & Lawrence. Uncle of Isabel, Amy, Brian, Maggie and John. Donations in memory of the deceased may be made to the American Cancer Society.
EPSTEIN-Harvey Alden. National Machinery Exchange mourns with great sorrow the untimely death of Harvey Epstein. Executive and Staff National Machinery Exchange
